author: Johnni Macke
title: Everyone in Hollywood is going nuts over this new Broadway show and it’s not “Hamilton”
text:
Everyone in Hollywood is going nuts over this new Broadway show and it’s not “Hamilton” There is one show on Broadway that everyone in Hollywood is going nuts over , and it’s not Hamilton . It’s Dear Evan Hansen !
Okay, you might think we’re crazy by saying Hollywood is not obsessing over Hamilton , because they clearly still are, but there’s a new hit in town. Broadway’s newest celebrity favorite is called Dear Evan Hansen and it stars Ben Platt as the lead , Evan.
According to the show’s website the musical includes, “A letter that was never meant to be seen, a lie that was never meant to be told, a life he never dreamed he could have.”
“Evan Hansen is about to get the one thing he’s always wanted: a chance to finally fit in,” the site reads. “Both deeply personal and profoundly contemporary, Dear Evan Hansen is a new American musical about life and the way we live it.”
Evan got some great signatures on his cast today. 
A photo posted by Dear Evan Hansen (@dearevanhansen) on Jan 3, 2017 at 6:22am PST 
Just by reading this description we are hooked, but in case you need more proof of how great it is, just look at all the stars singing its praises.
With Platt at the helm, Dear Evan Hansen has become a hotspot for celebrity sightings, especially from his fellow Pitch Perfect stars .
Rebel Wilson took a day off of filming the movie’s third installment to support everyone’s favorite a cappella magician. “So proud of Ben, who is just so absolutely incredible in Dear Evan Hansen on Broadway right now! Words fail to describe how good he and the rest of the cast are x,” Wilson wrote on her backstage photo.
So proud of Ben, who is just so absolutely incredible in DEAR EVAN HANSEN on Broadway right now! Words fail to describe how good he and the rest of the cast are x 
A photo posted by Rebel Wilson (@rebelwilson) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:21pm PST 
Other Pitch Perfect guests in the audience over the past fews months include newlyweds, Anna Camp and Skylar Astin .
Shmom and shdad came to visit @DearEvanHansen and my ❤️ exploded 
A photo posted by Ben Platt (@bensplatt) on Dec 29, 2016 at 7:22pm PST 
My roomie for life is a revelation in his new show. I am kvelling. Run to see him in #dearevanhansen and #youwillbefound 
A photo posted by Skylar Astin (@skylarastin) on Nov 13, 2016 at 8:24pm PST 
Some of Glee’s favorite actors have also been impressed by the musical and now we want to see it even more.
What an AMAZING night! Hoping everyone gets a chance to see the Broadway show @DearEvanHansen! 
A photo posted by Lea Michele (@leamichele) on Nov 26, 2016 at 10:40am PST 
I saw this wonderful man in Spring Awakening 4 times and his performance inspired me like crazy- was so special to have him at #DearEvanHansen. 
A photo posted by Ben Platt (@bensplatt) on Dec 19, 2016 at 8:29am PST 
What do you get when a Gotham star, a Girls lady, and a Glee guy hangout together? An epic night of musical fun!
Gotham, Girls, and Glee Gathered to Gush over @dearevanhansen and @bensplatt #GoSeeItASAP 
A photo posted by Allison Williams (@aw) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:52am PST 
Even Zac Efron made an appearance and Platt’s reaction is all of us. “Troy Bolton came to see @DearEvanHansen and middle school Ben had a freak out (so did 23 year old Ben). And did he wear a @DearEvanHansen scarf? Bet on it. Bet on it,” Platt captioned the great picture.
Troy Bolton came to see @DearEvanHansen and middle school Ben had a freak out (so did 23 year old Ben). And did he wear a @DearEvanHansen scarf? Bet on it. Bet on it. 
A photo posted by Ben Platt (@bensplatt) on Dec 22, 2016 at 7:24pm PST 
If you’re in New York City anytime soon, you should definitely check it out! Troy Bolton approves, so you know it’s good.
